author: cnbc.com
title: SHAREHOLDER ALERT: Levi & Korsinsky, LLP Reminds Investors of Commencement of an Investigation Involving Possible Securities Fraud Violations by the Board of Directors of Seven Stars Cloud Group, Inc.
text:
NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Levi & Korsinsky announces it has commenced an investigation of Seven Stars Cloud Group, Inc. (NASDAQ:SSC) concerning possible violations of federal securities laws.
On February 22, 2018, Seven Stars announced it was dismissing its independent registered public accounting firm after less than a year. Then on February 23, 2018, the Company announced it would slash its previously-issued full-year 2017 guidance by more than half, citing “unanticipated personnel issues that led to internal communication and internal administrative oversights that materialized during the Company’s 2017 fiscal year.” To obtain additional information, go to :
http://www.zlkdocs.com/SSC-Info-Request-Form-6490
or contact Joseph E. Levi, Esq. either via email at jlevi@levikorsinsky.com or by telephone at (212) 363-7500, toll-free: (877) 363-5972.
Levi & Korsinsky is a national firm with offices in New York, California, Connecticut and Washington D.C. The firm’s attorneys have extensive expertise in prosecuting securities litigation involving financial fraud, representing investors throughout the nation in securities and shareholder lawsuits. Attorney advertising. Prior results do not guarantee similar outcomes.
